channel.title: admin on Jordy Ruiz
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Jordy Ruiz

item.description: I am the Lead Software Developer at StatInf, where together with a team of five we develop RocqStatâ„¢, a patented statistical timing analysis tool for embedded systems. I coordinate development across the team and interface with R&D, Product and Corporate. Also, I maintain our assembly code program analysis modules, extracting the semantics of the program directly from the ELF files, for a variety of architectures (ARMv7-Thumb2, ARMv9, PPC, Texas Instruments…).
